definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: If I have a wad of cash, I find myself going through it quickly.
sentences.chinese: 若我手里现在一卷现金，我会将它一扫而空。

sentences.english: Then electric fields generated by the solar wind sweep away the charged particles.
sentences.chinese: 然后，太阳风产生的电场将带电粒子一扫而空。

sentences.english: Or as a dandelion see-pod and be swept away.
sentences.chinese: 或者像结荚的蒲公英被一扫而空。

sentences.english: your problems are completely taken away because  you're part of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 你的问题都会一扫而空，因为你成为了人群的一部分。

sentences.english: One's work is swept away when one becomes identified.
sentences.chinese: 一个人变得认同时，他的工作便一扫而空。

sentences.english: Your new boss has swept away the old code by breaking it himself.
sentences.chinese: 而你的新老板亲自将过去的规范一扫而空。

sentences.english: If Merrill fell, confidence would drain away.
sentences.chinese: 如果美林陷落，信心将一扫而空。

definition: to clear off/to make a clean sweep of
to vanish like smoke in thin air/to disappear
to obliterate completely/to vanish from the face of the earth
to go up in smoke/to vanish
congestion/to block/to congest/to crowd/to choke/to cram/to fill up/to stuff/to take up all the space
